triples.name: Metamorphic testing
triples.relevance: The paper proposes metamorphic testing as a new complementary testing technique to overcome test oracle problems.

triples.name: Software testing
triples.relevance: The paper applies metamorphic testing methods to software testing, building on existing testing practices.

triples.name: Test oracle
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the test oracle problem by using metamorphic relationships instead of traditional oracles.

triples.name: Sine and cosine
triples.relevance: The sine function is used as a concrete example to demonstrate the effectiveness of metamorphic testing.

triples.name: Search algorithm
triples.relevance: A search function is used as an example application to illustrate metamorphic testing principles.
